itemDisplayName: Deploy Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) on an existing VNET and AD
description: This template creates three new Azure VMs on an existing VNET and provisions them as a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) cluster
summary: This template creates 3 Azure VMs for a Windows Server 2016 Storage Spaces Direct (S2D) cluster on an existing Azure VNET and Active Directory domain
